channel.title: 国内源 on Daryl's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 国内源 on Daryl's Blog

item.title: Ubuntu 18.04换国内源
item.description: 国内有很多Ubuntu的镜像源，例如阿里、网易、清华、中科大。 我们这里以阿里云的源为例展示如何修改Ubuntu 18.04里面默认的源。 编辑/etc/apt/sources.list文件： deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-proposed main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-proposed main restricted universe multiverse deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse 中科大源 deb https://mirrors.
